maps.name: Abandoned City
maps.description: Fight through the ruins of a once-thriving metropolis. Urban warfare at its finest with multiple elevation levels and strategic chokepoints.

maps.name: Desert Outpost
maps.description: Defend your position in the scorching desert. Open terrain with limited cover requires careful tower placement.

maps.name: Frozen Wasteland
maps.description: Survive the harsh winter conditions. Ice and snow slow down zombies but also affect tower performance.

maps.name: Military Base
maps.description: Use the fortified military installation to your advantage. Pre-built defenses and strategic positions.

maps.name: Underground Tunnels
maps.description: Navigate the dark underground maze. Limited visibility and multiple entry points make this map challenging.
